backpack.name: Backpack
backpack.description: A backpack can hold one cubic foot or 30 pounds of gear. You can also strap items, such as a bedroll or a coil of rope, to the outside of a backpack.

book.name: Book
book.description: A book might contain poetry, historical accounts, information pertaining to a particular field of lore, diagrams and notes on gnomish contraptions, or just about anything else that can be represented using text or pictures. A book of spells is a spellbook.

component_pouch.name: Component pouch
component_pouch.description: A component pouch is a small, watertight leather belt pouch that has compartments to hold all the material components and other special items you need to cast your spells, except for those components that have a specific cost (as indicated in a spell's description).

mess_kit.name: Mess kit
mess_kit.description: This tin box contains a cup and simple cutlery. The box clamps together, and one side can be used as a cooking pan and the other as a plate or shallow bowl.

quiver.name: Quiver
quiver.description: A quiver can hold up to 20 arrows.

rations.name: Rations (1 day)
rations.description: Rations consist of dry foods suitable for extended travel, including jerky, dried fruit, hardtack, and nuts.

rope_hempen.name: Hempen rope (50 ft)
rope_hempen.description: Rope, whether made of hemp or silk, has 2 hit points and can be burst with a DC 17 Strength check.

spellbook.name: Spellbook
spellbook.description: Essential for wizards, a spellbook is a leather-bound tome with 100 blank vellum pages suitable for recording spells.

tinder_box.name: Tinderbox
tinder_box.description: This small container holds flint, fire steel, and tinder (usually dry cloth soaked in light oil) used to kindle a fire. Using it to light a torch—or anything else with abundant, exposed fuel—takes an action. Lighting any other fire takes 1 minute.

torch.name: Torch
torch.description: A torch burns for 1 hour, providing bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. If you make a melee attack with a burning torch and hit, it deals 1 fire damage.

waterskin.name: Waterskin
waterskin.description: A waterskin can hold up to 4 pints of liquid.
